channel.title: Trillopolis - Where the Players make the Game
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://www.trillopolis.com/images/logo2.png[/img][/CENTER]
Forums: [url=http://www.trillopolis.com/forums/index.php]Trillopolis[/url] Webclient [url=http://www.trillopolis.com/playnow.php]Trillopolis - Play Now[/url] Downloadable: [URL=http://"http://www.trillopolis.com/Trillopolisv1.5.jar"]http://www.trillopolis.com/Trillopolisv1.5.jar[/URL] Mirror 1: [url=http://up.ht/15f8his"]http://up.ht/15f8his]Uppit[/url]
[SIZE=12px][COLOR=red]Features:[/COLOR][/SIZE] 24/7 Forums Decanting Player Profiles Vote Shop Highscores Quests - A New Beginning - The Harmless Island - Gaining Salvation Minigames - Colosseum - Zombie Survival - Barbarian Assault - Pest Control - Fight Pits - Fight Caves All Skills Working w/ 100% Slayer Starter Class Prestiging Economy Based (No rare items are in shops, each boss has it's own rare.)
[SIZE=12px][COLOR=blue]Media:[/COLOR][/SIZE] [IMG]http://www.trillopolis.com/Advertisement/2.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.trillopolis.com/Advertisement/3.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.trillopolis.com/Advertisement/4.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.trillopolis.com/Advertisement/5.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.trillopolis.com/Advertisement/6.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.trillopolis.com/Advertisement/7.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.trillopolis.com/Advertisement/8.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.trillopolis.com/Advertisement/9.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.trillopolis.com/Advertisement/10.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.trillopolis.com/Advertisement/11.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.trillopolis.com/Advertisement/12.png[/img]

item.title: Trillopolis - Where the Players make the Game

item.description:
@Perfectv1 wrote:

Great server, and great economy. Great work with source. Keep up the good work!!
